## Matrix.setTranslationFromFloats() method

Inserts the translation vector (using 3 floats) in the current matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setTranslationFromFloats(x: number, y: number, z: number): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | defines the 1st component of the translation |
|  y | <code>number</code> | defines the 2nd component of the translation |
|  z | <code>number</code> | defines the 3rd component of the translation |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

the current updated matrix
